title.rendered: Living Inside a Fairy Tale: Edison Cordelia

content.rendered:
Why is it that we always want to see ourselves living a fine well equipped life? Have you ever asked yourself that question? According to most psychologists the urge to live a luxurious and well equipped life comes from a person’s sense of belonging, and that it goes a long way to increase the self-esteem for people. This is why most of us try to afford the best things in life that may give us the pleasure of owning not only a nice material but a means to fully express our taste in things, and enter a virtual club of collectors; a sense of belonging perhaps. This phenomenon extends to our ornaments like watches and jewelry, our clothes, shoes, our cellphones, our cars, furniture at home, even to the kind of homes we want to own.


Usually people are brand conscious while making these purchase decisions. Even for little things like a birthday cake that must belong from a nice well branded bakery, our spot to dine out or order in must be popular. A lot of people may openly regard this as an urge to show-off the good things, but the truth is that all these decisions are formed from our inner belief of rewarding ourselves with the hard earned money; and rightly so. We have all the right to express ourselves through our collections and make a continuous effort to upgrade our state of being; because what is man if he is not looking forward to do better in life?

Edison Real Estate offers their customers a fully crafted package when it comes to new homes. Starting from the neighborhood, the location, the plot placement, plot size, design, features, amenities, to the very experience of living, this brand has now become an epitome of quality assets. They have almost packaged their offerings into the perfect box, Edison Cordelia.


Edison Cordelia is the newest edition to the fleet of well thought and well designed living marvels. Named King Lear’s youngest Daughter Cordelia, Edison Cordelia too resembles beauty and class at the same level. The master architects behind the design have done justice to how William Shakespeare had once penned down this character. Intelligent and accommodating, Edison Cordelia is located in the up and growing planned neighborhood of Bashundhara Residential Area, where the young potential of the country is looking to settle.

Strategically placed in the M block, Edison Cordelia is three joined plot within the proximity of living necessities like grocery outlets, shopping malls, high end educational institutes, and top notch health care facilities. The location offers a quick exit through both the 300ft road into the latest 8-lane Purbachal express highway upon which new Dhaka is expanding its dreams of a megacity. It also has nearby exits

like the 100ft Madani avenue that crosspoints at Gulshan. Apart from this the location is a dream come true for city dwellers who would be looking to use the new metro rail for their regular transport, as it offers a short commute to the station. The airport and city railway station are all at a seemingly close distance.

Don’t just think yet that the placement is the key proposition for this apartment complex. At two spectacular categories of 3 Bedroom 2210 Sq. Ft. and 4 Bedroom 2575 Sq. Ft. Edison Cordelia offers a unique experience of living built on 22.5 Katha of its own land. Meaning, the project will be a get set go for buyers who are looking for a quick completion, handover, and registration. The world class features and amenities on this 52 car-parking plot includes a marvelous double height reception to welcome your guests, a comfortable lounge, large community hall with service area to help you host, fully equipped gym with changing rooms, a indoor games area, a barbecue zone to help you test your grilling skills, a wide open lawn, a beautiful garden, and a play zone for the little ones. Now this is some package isn’t it?


Wait, there’s more to come; it just doesn’t end here. When it comes to actually living inside the flats, Edison Cordelia truly takes the experience to the higher grounds. From the use of benchmark structural building materials to top global brands of elevators and power equipment, you enter your safe space to only find yourself welcomed into a warm reception floored with imported marble tiles. As you reach your apartment you open the classy heavy built door to find yourself off guard.

Perfect buffer zones, imported fixtures and fitting, mirror polished tiles, granite kitchen slab, and squarish bedrooms give you the upgrade that you were dearly seeking for yourself and your family. This is that which would truly add to your self esteem, your sense of belonging, and point to the fact that you have made it. You have made it to living inside your own fairytale.
